text: Maiṅ Yūhannā āp kā bhāī aur sharīk-e-hāl hūṅ. Mujh par bhī āp kī tarah zulm kiyā jā rahā hai. Maiṅ āp ke sāth Allāh kī bādshāhī meṅ sharīk hūṅ aur Īsā meṅ āp ke sāth sābitqadam rahtā hūṅ. Mujhe Allāh kā kalām sunāne aur Īsā ke bāre meṅ gawāhī dene kī wajah se is jazīre meṅ jo Patmus kahlātā hai chhoṛ diyā gayā.
